rule.name: AS_QNM_CDT_cloneQuestionnaireTemplate_Questions
rule.description: Rule to clone the questions in a template
rule.definition: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items: ri!questionsToClone, expression: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:QNM}AS_QNM_T_Question'( questionTemplateId: null, questionReferenceId: fv!item.questionReferenceId, questionTypeCode: fv!item.questionTypeCode, label: fv!item.label, instructions: fv!item.instructions, pageNumber: fv!item.pageNumber, groupNumber: fv!item.groupNumber, orderNumber: fv!item.orderNumber, responseOptions: #"_a-0000e4b1-2fbc-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_895029"( responsesToClone: fv!item.responseOptions ), responseRequirements: #"_a-0000e4b1-2fbc-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_894986"( res_requirementsToClone: fv!item.responseRequirements ), defaultResponses: #"_a-0000e4b1-2fbc-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_895029"( responsesToClone: fv!item.defaultResponses ), isExternalUserFacing: fv!item.isExternalUserFacing, isDisplayedPrecedentSets: #"_a-0000e4b1-2fbc-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_895105"( precedentSetsToClone: fv!item.isDisplayedPrecedentSets, questionsToClone: ri!questionsToClone ), isRequiredPrecedentSets: #"_a-0000e4b1-2fbc-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_895105"( precedentSetsToClone: fv!item.isRequiredPrecedentSets, questionsToClone: ri!questionsToClone ), questionCategoryTemplateId: wherecontains( fv!item.questionCategoryTemplateId, ri!categoriesToClone.questionCategoryTemplateId ), isActive: fv!item.isActive ) )
